welcome_message: Hello, welcome to my Web Portfolio!
recipes_description: Group project that involved creating a Recipe app with various access routes and application state control.
tfc_description: The application consists of a site managing a football game system through a dockerized backend and modeled with Sequelize.
delivery_description: Ruby On Rails repository of a delivery application with authentication, threads, Docker, and testing. Back-end and user interface with :admin and developer roles.
agrix_description: Java project done with the Spring ecosystem implementing a farm control system.
resraturant_description: The application consists of a system for generating menus considering possible dietary restrictions and ingredient availability in stock.
weather_app: Android application for weather consultation. It uses the OpenWeather API, material designs, interfaces, and data classes.
explore_description_projects: Check out more projects and collaborations on my <a rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://github.com/SamuelRocha91/" target="_blank">GitHub<a>.

about.description: Undergraduate student in Systems Analysis and Development at the Catholic University of Bras√≠lia, I hold a Web Developer certificate issued by Trybe, along with several other certifications issued by institutions such as freeCodeCamp, HackerRank, and LWSA.

about.title: Hometown
about.description: Brazilian, 33 years old, born and raised in Salvador-BA: a vibrant city rich in culture and tradition.

about.title: Profile
about.alt: man sitting on the sand looking at the sea
about.description: My hobbies include reading, running, going to the beach, and watching football. I enjoy simple things, being in contact with people and nature.
